name: Escape from the Planet of the Robot Monsters
name_original: Escape from the Planet of the Robot Monsters
description:
Escape from the Planet of the Robot Monsters is a shooter-arcade game developed by Domark, Atari Games and Tengen. It came out on 01-01-1989. Atari published the game.
You can play Escape from the Planet of the Robot Monsters on Atari ST, Atari Lynx, Commodore / Amiga and PC.
